title: Game Constantly Crashing 5mins into the game, and onwards!
body:
Hello League of Legends OCE Community,

Here is my issue:
As soon as i play a game, 5minutes into the game i crash. Once i re-connect, <5mins or so i crash again. I thought it was due to me playing BB (Butcher's Bridge). My first thought was that my computer (i used a mac, i know its a stupid platform/computer), so i lowered all my game settings to as long as it can be. 

BUT the problem is still there, so i thought i should play a normal game 5v5, assuming that it was not my computer's problem but the game mode itself. Unfortunately It still happens. So it did conclude to me that it is the patch.

Has anyone solved/fixed this problem, or is it a waiting game for Riot to fix?

peace!

replies.body:
Hey OMGtaKid,

Can you give the solutions on the [Bug Splat and Game Crashes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Riot Games Support article a try?
My girlfriend has the exact same problem! I wonder what's going on? She even tried repairing the files. No solution.

Really man that sucks!!
I did some research (just look at posts around the help & support) it is a patch problem, and repairing or reinstalling wont fix it! which sucks.
SO just gonna have to wait till a new patch tomorrow morning, or whenever :S
